cd:Time.cd:Description: Start date and time of Measurement

cd:Array.cd:Description: Map of Mie Measurements used by the L2B accumulations

cd:Integer.cd:Description: reference to the L2B wind result to which this L1B range bin contributed. It will be set to 0 if not used.
Weight used for this L1B range bin while accumulating the signals used to produce the L2B wind result to which this L1B range bin contributed. The valid range is 0-1000

cd:Array.cd:Description: Map of Rayleigh Measurements used by the L2B accumulations

cd:Integer.cd:Description: reference to the L2B wind result to which this L1B range bin contributed. It will be set to 0 if not used.
Weight used for this L1B range bin while accumulating the signals used to produce the L2B wind result to which this L1B range bin contributed. The valid range is 0-1000
